text: The 2016 Merlion Cup has been the 10th edition of the Merlion Cup, an invitational club basketball tournament organized by the Basketball Association of Singapore. The 2016 edition marked the return of the tournament which was held two decades before in 1996. The tournament took place at the OCBC Arena from 21–25 September and featured six teams from six countries. ==Participating teams== Six teams participated at the 2016 Merlion Cup. ==Results== ===Group stage=== Source: Basketball Association of Singapore ====Group A==== |} ====Group B==== |} ===Final round=== ====Semifinals==== ====Fifth place game==== ====Third place game==== ====Final==== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=240|Team |- | |align=left| |- | |align=left| |- | |align=left| |- |4 |align=left| |- |5 |align=left| |- |6 |align=left| |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ! 2016 Merlion Cup champions |- | Shanghai Sharks First title |} ==References== ==External links== * 2016–17 Category:2016–17 in Asian basketball Category:2016–17 in Singaporean basketball Category:September 2016 sports events in Asia
